alert.note: Alert for Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:27PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Vance and Warren Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Henderson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Warrenton, Norlina, Middleburg, Macon, Afton, Steele Creek Marina & Campground, Kerr Lake, Wise and Satterwhite Point Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
